details.title: Demonstration of a G-Band Transceiver for Future Space Crosslinks
details.abstract: This letter reports on the demonstration of a transceiver operating from 190 to 200 GHz. The system is assembled using splitblock waveguide integrated microwave assemblies, with MMICs realized using advanced InP HEMTs with sub-50 nm gate lengths. Across the band a receiver noise figure 6 dB and transmitter output power >20 dBm have been demonstrated. A table top link demonstrated successful QPSK and QAM modulation and demodulation using a 196 GHz carrier wave. Filtering was built into the system to ensure low in-band spurious response.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
